Plot: An barbarian warrior becomes a king when he defeats a king in armed combat and the king's heir conspire to overthrow him and reclaim the throne by resurrecting an evil sorceress.
Title: Kull the Conqueror
Writer: Robert E. Howard (worlds and characters), Charles Edward Pogue (screenplay)
Actors: Kevin Sorbo, Tia Carrere, Thomas Ian Griffith, Litefoot
